description: Stops a model compilation job. To stop a job, Amazon SageMaker AI sends the algorithm the SIGTERM signal. This gracefully shuts the job down. If the job hasn't stopped, it sends the SIGKILL signal. When it receives a StopCompilationJob request, Amazon SageMaker AI changes the CompilationJobStatus of the job to Stopping. After Amazon SageMaker stops the job, it sets the CompilationJobStatus to Stopped.

parameters.name: CompilationJobName
parameters.description: The name of the model compilation job to stop.
